definitions.text: any physical damage to the body caused by violence or accident or fracture etc.

examples: the death of his wife caused him great distress

definitions.text: feelings of mental or physical pain
the act of damaging something or someone

examples: This exercise will hurt your back

definitions.text: cause emotional anguish or make miserable
examples: It pains me to see my children not being taught well in school
Our business was hurt by the new competition
She hurt me when she did not include me among her guests
This remark really bruised my ego
Were you hurting after the accident?

definitions.text: feel pain or be in pain
suffering from physical injury especially that suffered in battle
examples: ambulances...for the hurt men and women

definitions.text: damaged inanimate objects or their value
